isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Side Electric Window and/or Electric Door Lock Switch Assembly

step1.para:
Remove driver side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Remove electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly (Item 1) by removing two pan head mach. screws (Item 2), then disconnect electric window and/or electric door lock switch connectors (Item 7, Figure 55) and remove electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly from upper door trim panel (Item 3). Save for reinstallation.

figure.caption: Figure 59. Driver Side Electric Window and/or Electric Door Lock Switch Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH ASSEMBLY
2. PAN HEAD MACH. SCREW, NO. 8-18 X 3/4
4. BACK SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL
5. FLAT DOME PINE TREE TRIM PUSH-IN FASTENER
6. FRONT SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Side Electric Window and/or Electric Door Lock Switch Assembly

step1.para:
Remove passenger side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 60 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Remove electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly (Item 1) by removing two pan head mach. screws (Item 2), then disconnect electric window and/or electric door lock switch connectors (Item 7, Figure 56) and remove electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly from upper door trim panel (Item 3). Save for reinstallation.

figure.caption: Figure 60. Passenger Side Electric Window and/or Electric Door Lock Switch Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH ASSEMBLY
2. PAN HEAD MACH. SCREW, NO. 8-18 X 3/4
4. BACK SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL
5. FLAT DOME PINE TREE TRIM PUSH-IN FASTENER
6. FRONT SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL
